page.title: 02ECOLOGY
page.content: {Grimoldby,Lincolnshire {Ecology {Climate An oceanic climate with cool summers, mild winters and rainfall throughout the year. Due to the nearness to the East coast there are occasional very cold Easterly winds in late winter/early spring, and cooling Easterly sea breezes in summer. Yearly Average Temperature : 91C Total Rainfall : 24.26ins Height of land above sea level varies from 21feet (6 metres) to 60feet (20 metres). {Footpaths The 218 is the main footpath through the villages. 211,220,221 and 222 divert from the 218, all walkable, and a scheme is going on to maintain them.
